articles.title: House passes bill banning certain semi-automatic guns
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — The House passed legislation Friday to revive a ban on certain semi-automatic guns , the first vote of its kind in years and a direct response to the firearms often used in the crush of mass shootings  ripping through communities nationwide.
